name: require-overhead
description: Comparing script overhead when using RequireJS, Browserify, webpack, etc

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run webpack && npm run requirejs && npm run concat && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.concat: cat input/amd/*.js > output/concat-amd.js && cat input/commonjs/*.js > output/concat-commonjs.js
scripts.uglifyjs: uglifyjs output/browserify-build.js -o output/browserify-build.min.js && uglifyjs output/requirejs-build.js -o output/requirejs-build.min.js && uglifyjs output/webpack-build.js -o output/webpack-build.min.js && uglifyjs output/concat-amd.js -o output/concat-amd.min.js && uglifyjs output/concat-commonjs.js -o output/concat-commonjs.min.js

author: Anders JÃ¶nsson
